name: Featured Video for WooCommerce
author: Foad Adeli

sections.description:
Bring your products to life with video! This easy-to-use WordPress plugin allows you to add a featured video to any product in your WooCommerce online store.

With just a few clicks, you can add featured videos from YouTube, Vimeo, or your own local videos on the product page! Display eye-catching product videos to engage customers and boost conversions.

See the difference video can make for your WooCommerce store! Install the Featured Video for WooCommerce plugin right now.

Key Features

  • Easily upload and embed a video on WooCommerce single products page
  • Supports videos from multiple sources such as: Self-Hosted, YouTube and Vimeo
  • Supports popular video formats like MP4, and WebM
  • Advanced video player with a whole lot of features!
  • Works seamlessly with variety of WooCommerce product types
  • Fully compatible with all standard WooCommerce themes!

How to Use This Plugin?

  1. Install and activate the plugin.
  2. Go to Dashboard Menu > Products > All Products.
  3. Find the product you want add video to, and click edit.
  4. On the Product data section, a new Featured Video tab has been added so you could select your video.
  5. Select the video you want, and enjoy!
sections.installation:
Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/featured-video-for-woocommerce directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
A new Featured Video tab will be added on the product edit screen.
Begin adding product videos and enjoy!
sections.faq:
Can I add videos from YouTube or Vimeo?

Yes! You can add product videos from YouTube, Vimeo, or upload your own video files. The plugin supports videos from multiple sources.

What if I have compatibility issues or questions?

Although this plugin is fully compatible with all standard WooCommerce themes, please don’t hesitate to contact me if you’re facing any problem! I’m available to help troubleshoot any compatibility issue and answer questions you may have. Just send me an email: info@foadadeli.ir

Want to hire me?

If you’re interested in working together, just send me an email: info@foadadeli.ir
sections.changelog:
2.1

Added settings page for plugin.

2.0

Now you can add videos from YouTube and Vimeo!

1.0

First release
